title: AI-Driven Connectionist Foreign Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and fundamental smartphone utilization abilities
context.additional_context: Enhanced networked learning using AI tools in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners improve writing proficiency by 20% by receiving personalized feedback (grammar/vocabulary) via AI chatbots at least once weekly
Learners document over 10 peer language exchange cases while participating twice weekly in collaborative networks within the LMS
Learners establish monthly learning plans and revise them three or more times using AI recommendation systems and self-assessment tools
Learners generate five or more context-specific dialogues for real-life problem-solving using smartphone-based AI translation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
